doc.field: Materials on Ronald Carey versus R.V. Durham in 1991 IBT elections, including Crowe articles for Newsday;challenges and complaints about election process; charges and other court documents in U.S. versus IBT, et al.; Teamsters Local 507; Bakery Workers Local 19; racketering onviction of Harold Friedman; Jackie Presser death; Crowe book drafts of prologue through section six for Charles Scribners Sons and MacMillion(publisher).
